page.title: 01WALKHAMPTON & DISTRICT
page.content: This area consists of one big Dartmoor tor (Sharpitor) and the valley of a Dartmoor river (the Walkham) On the western edge of the block, between the tor and the bottom of the valley, is the only settlement - Walkhampton. We surveyed the ecology of the high moorland, aspects of Walkhampton, (children's thoughts, education, transport, village centre buildings). We also looked briefly at local history and the general landscape and we tried to find out how people made their living and what sort of lives they led in the area. Plymouth is (June 1985) still a big military town, so we looked at what effect the armed srvices have on the area.
